Additional Include Directories
C:\OpenGL\glm;C:\OpenGL\glfw\include;C:\OpenGL\glew\include;C:\OpenGL\freeglut\include;%(AdditionalIncludeDirectories)

Additional Library Directories
C:\OpenGL\glfw\lib-vc2015;C:\OpenGL\glew\lib\Release\Win32;C:\OpenGL\freeglut\lib;%(AdditionalLibraryDirectories)

Additional Dependencies
opengl32.lib;freeglut.lib;glfw3.lib;glew32s.lib;%(AdditionalDependencies)
